overview: A sumptuous short film of friendship and adoration between boys, based on a poem by Peter LeBerge. Moments of joy, bonding and roughhousing on a school trip to the beach counterpoint one teen boyâ€™s introspective sexual awakenings and questionings. title: Boy Saint
